directions: In a small saucepan cook garlic in oil over moderately low heat, stirring, until softened and cool. In a small food processor or blender purée tomatoes, basil, oil mixture, and vinegar until pesto is smooth.
In a bowl toss steak with half of pesto and spread remaining pesto on bread. Divide steak among 4 bread slices and top with remaining 4 slices.
ingredients: 1/3 cup drained bottled dried tomatoes packed in oil
eight 1/2-inch slices sourdough bread, toasted lightly
title: Steak Sandwiches with Tomato Pesto
